Title: The Hurricane
Writer: Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter (book), Sam Chaiton (book), Terry Swinton (book), Armyan Bernstein (screenplay), Dan Gordon (screenplay)
Actors: Denzel Washington, Vicellous Shannon, Deborah Kara Unger, Liev Schreiber
Plot: The story of Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 17 nominations.
